items.summary: Add the user-uploaded image files `IMG_20260208_030749.jpg` and `image.jpg` to the frontend static assets folder `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and ensure they are included in the production build output.

Update the homepage couple-photo default image to use the uploaded image `IMG_20260208_030749.jpg` as the initial (fallback) image shown before any user selects a different image via the homepage file picker.
Update the popup modal default image to use the uploaded image `image.jpg` as the initial (fallback) image shown before any user selects a different image via the modal file picker.
